author: Anonymous Gear
title: BUG？
question:
What does this bug mean? Or what will this bug exactly affect our program? 
;; NOTE, for simplicity the spider lecture solution has a small bug in it.
;; Here's the bug.  Suppose a window is 400 high, how many numbers are in
;; the interval [0, 400]? Is it 400? If 0 is the number of the first interval,
;; what's the number of the last one?
student_answer: Think about what the brackets mean. [] and () are not the same. [] is an inclusive bracket, () is not.
